WRITING.TITLE: Franz Wright, Pulitzer Prize-winning poet, dead at age 62
Whos the Greatest Unreliable Narrator in Literature?

WRITING.TEXT: Not at all, but Sartre and Borges wrote books and Orson Welles is very literary.

WRITING.TITLE: Orson Welles's Citizen Kane was released on this day in 1941. Sartre and Borges reviewed the film
